Key Match Events: Kieffer Moore scored first for Wales in the 1st minute
Driton Camaj equalized for Montenegro in the 73rd minute
Harry Wilson scored the winning goal for Wales in the 80th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Wales secured a 2-1 victory, moving to 4 points in the group stage
Montenegro remains without a win, dropping to 0 points in the group stage
Miscellaneous Highlights: Match ended with a final score of 1-2 in favor of Wales
The match took place in Gradski Niksica, Montenegro on September 9, 2024
